attributes.action: immediately designate 5th March to be 'Traitors Day' and introduce a law which requires Traitors Day to be celebrated EVERY YEAR, in every city, town, village and hamlet throughout the land, by the burning of effigies of himself, David Cameron and Nick Clegg, all of whom are traitors.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Wednesday 5th March 2008 did more damage to democracy in this country than any other single event that has ever happened in the House of Commons.  Something as monumentally damaging as the betrayal of the people by a government 'of the people' which refused to stick by a promise which got it into office MUST BE REMEMBERED.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
